You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
NONPROFIT CLOUD
Set Up Program Management

Enable settings and assign permission sets to get started using Program Management.

NOTE Salesforce offers Nonprofit Cloud, which includes integrated platform solutions for Fundraising, Program Management, Case Management, and Grantmaking. This content provides information about these solutions. Find the managed package documentation in Salesforce for Nonprofits. If you’re not sure which version your organization uses, check with your Salesforce admin.
Turn on the Basics for Program and Case Management
Turn on Salesforce features that enhance Program and Case Management features.
Enable Program Management
To access and use program management capabilities, turn on Program and Benefit Management.
Create Users for Program Management
Create user records for the program managers and case managers who use Program Management.
Security and Permissions for Program Management
Understand permission sets in Program Management and how to assign them to users.
Activate the Program Management Data Processing Engine Definition Templates
Clone the available Program Management Data Processing Engine definition templates and activate them before running the definitions.
Using a Schedule-Triggered Flow to Schedule Program Management Data Processing Engine Definitions
To run the program management Data Processing Engine (DPE) definitions on a schedule, associate the DPE definition with a schedule-triggered flow.
Validation Rules, Report Types, and Reports for Program Management
To enforce good practices and consistency when you enter data, add validation rules. To analyze your Program Management information, create report types and reports.
Set Up Units of Measure for Program Management
Configure the types of units of measure depending on your organization’s requirements and your use cases. For example, Period for Hours unit of measure, or Number for Kits unit of measure.
Create Field Sets on the Benefit Disbursement Object
Create field sets with benefit-specific fields on the Benefit Disbursement object and then add the field set to the required benefit so that program managers can view additional fields from the field set while tracking participant attendance.
Add Case Programs in Related Lists of Case Object
Customize the page layout of the Case object to add Case Programs in the related lists so that a Case Manager can easily access and enroll case participants in a program.
Modify User Access with Field-Level Security
You can restrict users' access to the fields on these objects: Program, Program Enrollment, Benefit Disbursement.
Enable and Configure Timelines for Programs and Benefits
Use the Timeline component to track activities related to a program, participant, or benefit on a chronological, intuitive, and visual timeline.

title: Setting Up Program Management in Nonprofit Cloud
